org.judal.metadata.bind

Class JdoPackageMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.metadata.bind.JdoPackageMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetadataScanner

    public class JdoPackageMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetadataScanner

    Load schema metadata from a JDO XML resource file of a package.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

      • JdoPackageMetadata

        public JdoPackageMetadata(DataSource dataSource,
                          java.lang.String packagePath,
                          java.lang.String xmlFileName)

        Constructor.

        Parameters:
        dataSource - DataSource
        packagePath - String A package path composed of names separated by forward slash like "com/acme/app/model"
        xmlFileName - String Optional. Name (with extension) of XML file present as a resource in packagePath

      • openStream

        public java.io.InputStream openStream()
                               throws java.io.IOException

        Open resource containing the JDO XML description of a schema

        If XML file name was set to null in the constructor then metadata.xml is used as file name by default.
        Returns:
        InputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
